title: Nightmare Inspector: Yumekui Kenbun, Vol. 1: Lost Things
description: Are you afraid your dreams will come true?For those who suffer nightmares, help awaits at the Silver Star Tea House, where patrons can order much more than just Darjeeling. Hiruko is a special kind of private investigator. He's a dream eater. And he'll rid you of your darkest visionsâ€¦for a price.Dreams on the menu this a restless soul, a murderous beauty, a woman afraid of falling apart, a grieving lover, an unforgiving son, a suicidal actress and a mysterious voice on the other end of a lonely young man's phone.
author: Shin Mashiba
